name: Mayan Ruins Demo
description:
This is a simple playable scene to promote and demonstrate our Mayan Ruins environment.

Assets used in this demo

◆ Mayan Ruins https://runemarkstudio.com/unity-asse...

◆ Tropical Forest Pack https://bit.ly/3cnUxwz

◆ Aura 2 Volumetric Light & Fog https://bit.ly/3bt65yk

◆ 3rd Person Controller by Vinicius Marques
